Name: Dice Tribes: Ambitions
About the game: Dice Tribes: Ambition is a dice worker placement game. Starting with a small number of villagers, you will need to manage them and grow the tribes in order to complete one of the ambitions. Opportunities and Dangers lies ahead and you will need to dispatch your villagers to take care of them. Prepare your villagers as you attempt to complete one of the ambition to win the game. Key Features Choose from one of 6 tribes, each with their own village building. Choose from more than 15 different structures and construct them to aid in your Ambition. Choose from one of many ambitions to complete, including hidden ones. Draft mode that forces you to adapt to different restrictions and challenges.
